scripts.build: tsc main-simple.ts --outDir dist --target ES2020 --module CommonJS --strict && mv dist/main-simple.js dist/main-simple.cjs
scripts.build:windows: tsc main-windows.ts --outDir dist --target ES2020 --module CommonJS --strict --esModuleInterop && mv dist/main-windows.js dist/main-windows.cjs
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:windows
scripts.test:windows: tsc test-windows-collectors.ts --outDir dist --target ES2020 --module CommonJS --strict --esModuleInterop && node dist/test-windows-collectors.js
scripts.package:all: npm run package:linux && npm run package:windows && npm run package:macos
